title: RIOT PLEASE!! SERIOUSLY!..
body: Recently i have been having issues where i am constantly being disconnected from games, And Before anybody says anything, NO it is not my internet, my internet and everything my end is completely fine, but Here is the Thing that really annoys me and makes me want to stop playing league... I Get punished because Riot can't sort out THEIR technical faults.. LIKE SERIOUSLY for the last 2 days this has been happening and i'm the one who gets put in lower Que priority because of Riots mistakes.. like.. SERIOUSLY... I literally just spent the last 3 - 4 hours Trying to get out of low P queue only to get DC'D from ONE GAME and put straight back into Low Que for 5 more games... SERIOUSLY! ARE YOU KIDDING ME RIGHT NOW! RIOT.... SERIOUSLY!!!! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Even if your internet is fine elsewhere, you can specifically have issues connecting to servers.  In this case, it sounds like you are having problems connecting to the game server, and end up disconnecting.  To start, go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your connection to the game.  It's important to get that fixed up and avoid further leaverbuster queues.  Hope it helps!
